💥 Problem

Help is needed with neighbourhood assistance, like we saw in Wuhan. Order and deliver supplies. Assist the elderly. See: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1UQCywLH887-IzYAxvYp6REkH-uN9XBqZUPMVhWiEho0/edit#heading=h.q6nf55nbm8ll

👨‍🔬Hypothesis

Software to help people organize neighborhood assistance.

🤔 Assumptions

  • Not needed for general neighbourhood help but will help if testing becomes available at some point
